keywords: ['slow jazz song', 'young female voice', 'acoustic guitar', 'finger snaps', 'keyboard', 'shaker', 'romantic mood']
caption: This slow jazz song features a female voice. This is accompanied by an acoustic guitar playing chords. A keyboard plays a fills using a xylophone-like tone. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. Finger snaps are played in some spaces between lines. A shaker provides the percussion for this song. The song features a jazz chord progression providing some complexity to this song. The mood of this song is romantic. This song can be played in a romantic movie.
